      • orderDispatched

        public void orderDispatched(int orderID)
        Method to complete the warehouse worker checkout process. Order status set to out for delivery Order removed from employees checked out order list Record made of employee who checked out order Accounts updated so aware of order dispatch
        Parameters:
        orderID -

      • checkItemsInStock

        public boolean checkItemsInStock(List<Product> products)
        Helper Method to checked a list of Products stock levels in the database. Useful for checking if a list of products is in stock before allowing an order to be check out and again before going to pick a checked out order.
        Parameters:
        products -
        Returns:
        if all items in the list are in stock

      • checkItemInStock

        Helper Method to check a products stock levels in the database.
        Parameters:
        product -
        Returns:
        item is in stock

      • updateStock

        public void updateStock(Order order)
        Method called on a customer or purchase order check out. Calls reduce or increase stock update methods depending on the order instance (reduce stock if instance of customer order) (increase stock if instance of purchase order)
        Parameters:
        orderID - - Id of the order to have its stock levels updated
